pages.text: Artillery can be loaded with varying types of ammo, providing different projectile effects.$(br)$(br)Some types available are listed in the following pages.

pages.heading: Cannonball
pages.text: Cannonballs are the most simple of projectiles. It breaks blocks on impact and does major damage to any mobs hit.

pages.heading: High-explosive shell
pages.text: High-explosive shells are a less piercing, more explosive version of a normal cannonball.
